INSERT INTO users (telegram_id, first_name, last_name, username, language_code, app_version, last_login_at)
VALUES ({{ $json.telegram_id }}, '{{ $json.first_name }}', '{{ $json.last_name }}', '{{ $json.username }}', '{{ $json.language_code }}', '{{ $json.app_version }}', NOW())
ON CONFLICT (telegram_id) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  first_name = EXCLUDED.first_name,
  last_name = EXCLUDED.last_name,
  username = EXCLUDED.username,
  language_code = EXCLUDED.language_code,
  app_version = EXCLUDED.app_version,
  last_login_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, telegram_id, created_at

SELECT 
  uc.role,
  c.id as company_id,
  c.name as company_name
FROM user_companies uc
JOIN companies c ON c.id = uc.company_id
WHERE uc.user_id = '{{ $json.id }}' AND uc.is_active = true
ORDER BY uc.created_at ASC
LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO sessions (session_token, user_id, company_id, role, expires_at)
VALUES ('{{ $json.session_token }}', '{{ $json.user_id }}', {{ $json.company_id ? "'" + $json.company_id + "'" : "NULL" }}, '{{ $json.role }}', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days')
RETURNING id, session_token, user_id, company_id, role, created_at, expires_at
